TopicTitle: How does no crash damage work?

Articles.Content: I try to use it when im coming in to fast for a splashdown but i always crash anyway, does it not work in water or something?
It dosen't work on water, and it's rare to see it work on land. Sometimes it does though. You might also want to enable unbreakable joints, but there's no guarantee it will actually work
I've wondered this as well. As the Destroyer says, it does not work. I found a solution a long time ago though. Learning to land. ;-)
It doesn't. Neither does unbreakable joints. It seems to make it harder to break stuff, but not impossible.
It used to work way back when, but I think they never bothered to update the code for the two cheats since they started overhauling physics.
It increases the part tenacity so they require more force to be destroyed. However it's feeble on its own and pairs well with the Hack Gravity option.
